data.title: ::ITALIAN GIALLO (+ ITS OTHERS)::
data.meta_description:
THE GIST OF THE LIST: The "giallo" - Italian thrillers which share thematic and stylistic tropes, namely repressed memories, total insanity, nightmarish dreams, horrific murders, maddening mysteries, and stunning aesthetics.

See also HOLLYWOOD GIALLO (+ ITS OTHERS) (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls063236792/) which lists mainstream films which have either influenced or have been inspired by the "giallo" genre.

[LISTED IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER]

OTHER LISTS:

CAMMANDO (MEN-ON-A-MISSION) THRILLERS (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls031779885/) CON THRILLERS (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls031520686/) COURTROOM THRILLERS (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls014985888/) CULT EUROPEAN SUPERHERO MOVIES (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls074252947/) DARK COMEDIES WITH PESKY CORPSES, BOTCHED KIDNAPPINGS, MURDEROUS BLUNDERS & ACCIDENTAL DEATHS (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls003668695/) DEALS WITH THE DEVIL (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls002007187/) DINNER PARTIES FROM HELL (http://www.imdb.com/list/ls063344562/) DON'T PERFORM THE AUTOPSY! I'M NOT DEAD!
